description: This file sets up the router configuration for a Vue.js application using vue-router, defining routes for 'home' and 'about' views with lazy-loading enabled for the 'about' route.

methods.name: createRouter
methods.description: Initializes a new router instance with specified history mode and routes.

methods.name: createWebHistory
methods.description: Creates a history object for HTML5 history mode, based on the base URL.
